IN.IC: je oblika za sedanjik, preteklik in pretekli deležnik.

sense.def:
The cost of something
je znesek, ki ga potrebujemo, da nekaj kupimo, storimo ali izdelamo.

seg.quote: The total cost of the holiday was £300.
The building was restored at a cost of £500,000.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ

sense.def:
Besedo
cost
uporabljamo, ko govorimo o denarnem znesku, ki ga moramo za kaj plačati.

seg.quote: A two-day stay there cost me $125.
A freezer doesn't cost much to run.

sense.def:
The cost of achieving something
je izguba, škoda ali poškodba, ki nastane zato, da nekaj dosežemo.

seg.quote: The cost in human life had been enormous.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ,
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
Če neki dogodek ali napaka
costs someone something
, nekdo nekaj izgubi zaradi nekega dogodka ali napake.

seg.quote: A single error here could cost you your life.

sense.def:
Če rečemo, da mora biti nekaj narejeno
at all costs
, poudarimo, da je pomembno, da tisto naredimo.
